short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Load soft subtitles for audio drama websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Load soft subtitles and display them on the audio drama page. (Mainly for non-Chinese sub of Chinese audio drama)
Website supported: Missevan
Format supported: SRT, LRC, CSV(fanjiao format)
You can set background color and font color for custom display style.
加载本地字幕文件在猫耳广播剧播放页面显示（主要用于以外挂方式显示非中文字幕字幕）。
